body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Modeling v3
  • Add type-ahead functionality in Provider Search
  • Consolidate formula steps into a non-modal 'Find Providers' page based on custom step
  • Save actual provider locations instead of filter criteria
  • Add delta percentages and colored directional arrows to cost and quality columns on search results page
  • Add selectable results page when searching on providers

Issues Fixed

Rank Networks
  • Fixed client specific issue where user unable to Share via Email when using Send Survey feature
